Text:
If you created this torrent just for a single recipient, why did you not simply email the .torrent file to your friend?
Why in the world did you post it on a public web site for millions of people to see?


Also, your "stealing bandwidth" comment indicates that you do not understand how the bit torrent protocol actually works.
The reality is that the more participants there are in a torrent swarm, the better it works for everyone.
